amendment.description: Amendment originally sought to authorize funding for the Advanced Technology Program and the Manufacturing Extension Partnerships Program under the National Institute of Standards and Technology. \ As amended by the Morella substitute amendment (A025), the above was replaced with language that authorizes $90 million for the Manufacturing Extension Partnerships Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to authorize NIST's Advanced Technology Program and the agency's Manufacturing Extension Program. The authorization level is set at $105,000,000 to be distributed as may be necessary by the Secretary.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (CA) amendment (A024) as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
